title: A house with apartment for sale
location: walking distance from the Eye Hospital , Colombo 10
details:
A beautifully appointed house on 9.15 perches of land conveniently located in Colombo 10 about 200 meters from the Eye Hospital is for sale

The property has two self- contained spacious units with two separate entrances and is built on 3 floors.

The first unit is 2340 sq.ft and is situated on the ground and first floor. Comprises of a large Sitting/ Dining room, Kitchen,pantry,4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms( one en-suite) and a small balcony.

The second unit is 1835 sq.ft and is situated on the first and second floor. This too has a large Sitting/ Dining room, Kitchen,Pantry, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms ( one en-suite)

Both units are fully air-conditioned.

The property is gated with a small front garden and a car port for 2 cars.
